Generalised Power Law Detector
==============================

Localization
------------

The GPL detector is fully compatible with [generic PAMGuard localisers](../../../localisation/docs/localisation_generic.html) the [Bearing Localiser](../../../localisation/bearingLocaliser/docs/BL_Overview.html) and the [Group 3D Localiser](../../../localisation/group3d/docs/3doverview.html).
